name: B. Braun Aesculap Spine VR
description: An interactive presentation of lumbar spinal surgery techniques with instruments produced by B.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7-6700K or higher Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
